name: Y3K Tutor In Your Home
tag_list: tutor, tutoring, education, special-ed, adhd, school, child, children, weston-ma, needham-ma, natick-ma, wayland-ma, wellesley-ma, newton-ma, brookline-ma, dover-ma, sudbury-ma
overview:
We offer personalized, one-on-one tutoring in the convenience of your home.

We teach mild to severe special education students and regular education as well. We tutor special ed. children including ADD, ADHD, Asperger’s, autism, emotional/behavioral, gifted, language disabilities, executive function, life-skills, PDD, physically disabled, and Tourette’s. We also teach regular ed. children organizational skills, homework coaching, motivation, homeschool help, study skills, and time management.

All major subjects are covered. Our math tutoring includes algebra, geometry, and basic operations. Our language arts English tutoring includes reading comprehension, writing, phonics, and reading fluency. Other subjects we tutor include history and science. Y3K Tutor In Your Home also tutors students in test preparation including the MCAS tests.

Y3K Tutor In Your Home is education’s best in-home tutoring company with corporate headquarters located in the Boston, Massachusetts area. The company originated in the Brookline, Dover, Natick, Needham, Newton, Sudbury, Wayland, Wellesley, and Weston MA areas and has since spread to help kids and adults everywhere. We tutor students from pre-kindergarten through adult. Our tutors travel to the student’s home to give each individual direct one-on-one support.
